data.name: Portal To Paradise
data.desc:
ü™ÇIn this story for children you find a special portal which transports you to a paradise of all of your favourite things...a magical place, just for you‚Ä¶
An idea may be to unwind with your child, listening to this peaceful kids world together...bliss!

data.name: Space Ship To The Moon
data.desc:
üåñIn this story for kids we take the child on a journey in a spaceship to the moon! 
This is a story and is a great form of relaxation for children and stretches the imagination.
This is aimed at making the child feel safe and re-establish feelings of tranquility when suffering challenging emotions such as stress, worry & anxiety.

data.name: The Wishing Well
data.desc:
ü•±This story is aimed at all children out there who may feel the need for some relaxation. In this story you will be guided to a wishing well in your secret garden and you will be granted one wish...so make sure you make it a good one!
This story is ideal for children in the classroom but is also suited for kids of all ages and can aid with anxiety, stress, worry, ADHD, sleeping issues etc.

data.name: The Fairy Snow Queen
data.desc:
‚õÑÔ∏èIn this story you will embark on a Magical adventure to Fairy Land and meet the Fairy Snow Queen.
You will meet Rupert the Robot, Sophia the Cuddly Bear and Norman the Toy Car...all who have been brought to life by the Fairy Snow Queen.
This festive Kids Meditation Story can be used as a relaxation or to aid sleep, anxiety and stress...or just to enhance the imagination!
An idea may be to unwind with your child, listening to this peaceful meditation story together...bliss!

data.name: Balloon
data.desc:
üéàIn this story you partake in the journey of a lifetime: in a Hot Air Balloon!
And not only that...you will be accompanied by your Animal Spirit Guide and the Kind Elf...
This Meditation is a form of Guided Imagery which is ideal for relaxation, sleep, anxiety, worries etc.
An idea may be to unwind with your child, listening to this peaceful story together...bliss!

data.name: Flying Unicorns
data.desc:
ü¶ÑIn this story we take the child on a majestic adventure with Flying Unicorns! 
Let your child visit magical kingdoms near and far...it may even be an idea to join them on the ride :-)
This relaxation for kids is aimed at making the child feel safe and re-establish feelings of tranquility when suffering challenging emotions such as stress, worry & anxiety.
Enjoy the journey with your Flying Unicorns!

data.name: Beach Relaxation
data.desc:
üèñEver feel like you just want to get away from it all for a short while and leave all your troubles behind? Then this is the meditation for you!
You find yourself walking along a beautiful white sandy beach, listening to the peaceful sound of the ocean waves. You are guided through this beach relaxation meditation by a soothing English female voice.
This story is ideal to aid with Stress, Anxiety and Depression.

data.name: Super Power Spectacles
data.desc:
ü¶∏In this story you will have an amazing adventure when you are given a pair of Super Power Spectacles by the wise old owl.
These Super Power Spectacles allow you a different super power each time you wear them...WOW!!!
An idea may be to unwind with your child, listening to this peaceful Kids Relaxation together...bliss!

data.name: The Friendly Whale
data.desc:
üê≥In this story the child will be taken on a wonderful underwater journey where they will meet a new buddy for life...The Friendly Whale!
They will spend some time with this beautiful creature, where they will explore the ocean and he will help ease any worries, fears or anxieties they may have - a real stress-buster!
This is the ideal relaxation for all children! Enjoy kids! :-)

data.name: Your Guardian Wolf
data.desc:
üíñIn this story you will get to meet your Guardian Wolf and his family. Your Guardian Wolf is a powerful and loyal protector and will help you with whatever you need.
Your Guardian Wolf also has a special message for you...listen and find out!
An idea may be to unwind with your child, listening to this relaxation for children together...bliss!

data.name: Magic Carpet Ride Guided Imagery Relaxation
data.desc:
üé©Ô∏èLeave your worries and stress at home whilst you take the trip of a lifetime on your magic carpet to lands afar!
This story for children uses imagery and visualization to put the child in a state of relaxation and with the aid of a 'worry basket' to leave all of their worries and troubles behind.

data.name: The Fairy Garden
data.desc:
üë∂Let your child take a trip to the magical secret garden where they will be introduced to Fairies in this story.
During this journey to the Fairy Garden they will get to spend time with the fairies and learn valuable wisdom.
An idea may be to unwind with your child, listening to this kids relaxation together...bliss!

data.name: Riding On A Rainbow
data.desc:
üåàIn this story you will get to ride on a rainbow!!! Yes, you heard correctly...RIDE ON A RAINBOW!
You will receive healing and wisdom from all of the rainbow colours and may even find out what lies at the end of the rainbow too!
This Kids Meditation is ideal for relaxation, anxiety, sleep and expanding the imagination.
An idea may be to unwind with your child, listening to this peaceful Kids Relaxation together...bliss!

data.name: Healing Green Light
data.desc:
‚ö°Ô∏èThis is a short story for kids designed to aid any healing that may be needed. This may come in the form of worries or anxiety, or it may come in the form of something more physical.
A Powerful healing green light is used to help remove any unwanted energies.
An idea may be to unwind with your child, listening to this healing Meditation for Children together...bliss!

data.name: The Giant Dog Of Giant Land
data.desc:
üê∂Take a trip to the place where trees are the size of the Eiffel Tower and Ladybirds the size of dogs! Take a trip to GIANT LAND!
In this story you will get to go on a ride with the friendly Giant Dog who will tell you all about this world...
This story is a great Meditation for stress, anxiety or worries...but is also ideal for general meditation, relaxation and SLEEP!!!

data.name: Little Green Alien
data.desc: üëæIn this story you will meet your new friend the ‚ÄòLittle Green Alien‚Äô who will take you on a ride in their Flying Saucer and share valuable wisdom with you. You may even be assigned on a special mission!

data.name: Rainbow Water Fall
data.desc:
üçÉIn this story for children your child will partake in a wonderful journey to the Rainbow Waterfall with their trusty Animal Spirit Guide.
The Rainbow Waterfall is not like any other waterfall; it is a magical waterfall that washes away all stresses and worries and replaces them with happiness, peace and joy!

data.name: Your Secret Tree house
data.desc:
üè°In this story we take the child on a journey to their peaceful place; to their secret treehouse in the forest where they find pure relaxation.
This is aimed at making the child feel safe and re-establish feelings of tranquility when suffering challenging emotions such as stress, worry & anxiety.

data.name: Cap Of Confidence
data.desc:
üëíThis story was written due to a parent asking us if we could create a story and the symptoms of bullying such as anxiety, worry, stress and depression - symptoms that a child shouldn't have to encounter.
So, enjoy this Guided Visualization...put on your Cap of Confidence and be free!!! :-)

data.name: Mermaid And The Underwater Palace
data.desc:
ü¶ÄIn this story you will take a trip under the ocean to meet the amazing mermaid who will show you her magical underwater palace! 
An idea may be to unwind with your child, listening to this peaceful Relaxation for Children together :-)

data.name: Your Magical Island
data.desc:
üèùIn this story we take the child on a visualization journey to their magical island where they find pure relaxation and learn some very valuable pearls of wisdom along the way!
This is aimed at making the child feel safe and re-establish feelings of tranquility when suffering challenging emotions such as stress, worry & anxiety.
Enjoy your guided imagery journey to your magical island!
